get.description: Search for Zomato locations by keyword. Provide coordinates to get better search results

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: max number of results to fetch

get.description: Get Foodie Index, Nightlife Index, Top Cuisines and Best rated restaurants in a given location

parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.description: location id obtained from locations api

parameters.name: entity_type
parameters.description: location type obtained from locations api

get.summary: Get list of all cuisines in a city
get.description:
Get a list of all cuisines of restaurants listed in a city. The location/city input can be provided in the following ways -
  1. Using Zomato City ID
  2. Using coordinates of any location within a city

List of all restaurants serving a particular cuisine can be obtained using '/search' API with cuisine ID and location details

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: id of the city for which cuisines are needed

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: latitude / longitude of any point within a city

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: latitude / longitude of any point within a city

get.summary: Get Zomato collections in a city
get.description:
Returns Zomato Restaurant Collections in a City. The location/City input can be provided in the following ways -
  1. Using Zomato City ID
  2. Using coordinates of any location within a city

List of all restaurants listed in any particular Zomato Collection can be obtained using the '/search' API with Collection ID and Zomato City ID as the input

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: id of the city for which collections are needed

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: latitude / longitude of any point within a city

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: latitude / longitude of any point within a city

get.description:
Find the Zomato ID and other details for a city . You can obtain the Zomato City ID in one of the following ways:
  1. City Name in the Search Query - Returns list of cities matching the query
  2. Using coordinates - Identifies the city details based on the coordinates of any location inside a city

If you already know the Zomato City ID, this API can be used to get other details of the city.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: number of max results to display

get.summary: Get list of restaurant types in a city
get.description:
Get a list of restaurant types in a city. The location/City input can be provided in the following ways -
  1. Using Zomato City ID
  2. Using coordinates of any location within a city

List of all restaurants categorized under a particular restaurant type can obtained using /Search API with Establishment ID and location details as inputs

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: latitude / longitude of any point within a city

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: latitude / longitude of any point within a city

get.summary: Get location details based on coordinates
get.description: Get Foodie and Nightlife Index, list of popular cuisines and nearby restaurants around the given coordinates
Get a list of categories. List of all restaurants categorized under a particular restaurant type can be obtained using /Search API with Category ID as inputs
Get detailed restaurant information using Zomato restaurant ID. Partner Access is required to access photos and reviews.

parameters.name: res_id
parameters.description: id of restaurant whose details are requested

get.summary: Get daily menu of a restaurant
get.description: Get daily menu using Zomato restaurant ID.

parameters.name: res_id
parameters.description: id of restaurant whose details are requested

get.description: Get restaurant reviews using the Zomato restaurant ID. Only 5 latest reviews are available under the Basic API plan.

parameters.name: res_id
parameters.description: id of restaurant whose details are requested

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: max number of results to retrieve

get.description:
The location input can be specified using Zomato location ID or coordinates. Cuisine / Establishment / Collection IDs can be obtained from respective api calls. Get up to 100 restaurants by changing the 'start' and 'count' parameters with the maximum value of count being 20. Partner Access is required to access photos and reviews.
Examples:
  1. To search for 'Italian' restaurants in 'Manhattan, New York City', set cuisines = 55, entity_id = 94741 and entity_type = zone
  2. To search for 'cafes' in 'Manhattan, New York City', set establishment_type = 1, entity_type = zone and entity_id = 94741
  3. Get list of all restaurants in 'Trending this Week' collection in 'New York City' by using entity_id = 280, entity_type = city and collection_id = 1

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: max number of results to display

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: radius around (lat,lon); to define search area, defined in meters(M)

parameters.name: cuisines
parameters.description: list of cuisine id's separated by comma

parameters.name: establishment_type
parameters.description: estblishment id obtained from establishments call

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: collection id obtained from collections call

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: category ids obtained from categories call

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: used with 'sort' parameter to define ascending / descending

zomato_handle.description: User's @handle; uniquely identifies a user on Zomato

foodie_level_num.description: Number to identify user's foodie level; ranges from 0 to 10

foodie_color.description: Color hex code used with foodie level on Zomato

profile_url.description: URL for user's profile on Zomato

profile_deeplink.description: short URL for user's profile on Zomato; for use in apps or social sharing

real_city_name.description: Actual city name; can be different from city_name in some cases

city_id.description: ID of city; corresponds to city_name

entity_type.description: Type of location; one of [city, zone, subzone, landmark, group, metro, street]

entity_id.description: ID of location; (entity_id, entity_type) tuple uniquely identifies a location

title.example: Chelsea Market, Chelsea, New York City

popularity.description: Foodie index of a location out of 5.00

nightlife_index.description: Nightlife index of a location out of 5.00

top_cuisines.description: Most popular cuisines in the locality

link.description: URL of the web search page of the locality

best_rated_restaurants.description: list of top rated restaurants in location

nearby_restaurants.description: popular restaurants around the provided coordinates

link.description: URL to web search page of locality

results_start.description: The starting location within results from which the results were fetched (used for pagination)

results_shown.description: The number of results fetched (used for pagination)

average_cost_for_two.description: Average price of a meal for two people

price_range.description: Price bracket of the restaurant (1 being pocket friendly and 4 being the costliest)

currency.description: Local currency symbol; to be used with price

thumb.description: URL of the low resolution header image of restaurant

featured_image.description: URL of the high resolution header image of restaurant

photos_url.description: URL of the restaurant's photos page

menu_url.description: URL of the restaurant's menu page

events_url.description: URL of the restaurant's events page

has_online_delivery.description: Whether the restaurant has online delivery enabled or not

is_delivering_now.description: Valid only if has_online_delivery = 1; whether the restaurant is accepting online orders right now

has_table_booking.description: Whether the restaurant has table reservation enabled or not

deeplink.description: Short URL of the restaurant page; for use in apps or social shares

cuisines.description: List of cuisines served at the restaurant in csv format

all_reviews_count.description: [Partner access] Number of reviews for the restaurant

photo_count.description: [Partner access] Total number of photos for the restaurant, at max 10 photos for partner access

phone_numbers.description: [Partner access] Restaurant's contact numbers in csv format

thumb_url.description: URL for 200 X 200 thumb image file

res_id.description: ID of restaurant for which the image was uploaded

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the photo was uploaded

friendly_time.description: User friendly time string; denotes when the photo was uploaded

rating.description: Rating on scale of 0 to 5 in increments of 0.5

review_text.example: The best latte I've ever had. It tasted a little sweet

rating_color.description: Color hex code used with the rating on Zomato

review_time_friendly.description: User friendly time string corresponding to time of review posting

likes.description: No of likes received for review

user.description: User details of author of review

aggregate_rating.description: Restaurant rating on a scale of 0.0 to 5.0 in increments of 0.1

rating_color.description: Color hex code used with the rating on Zomato

city_id.description: ID of city where zone lies

zone_id.description: ID of the zone where subzone lies

collection_id.description: ID of the collection of restaurants

description.example: The most popular restaurants in town this week

image_url.description: URL for header image of the collection

res_count.description: Number of restaurants in the collection

share_url.description: short URL for apps and social sharing

is_state.description: Whether this location is a state

externalDocs.description: See where your friends are dining
